cause.description:
EarthE Honors mission is to create fun ways for everyone to challenge and reward friends for protecting our exquisite biosphere. Support our work via www.EarthE.org/Donate/ and Paypal.
1. Manifest a world that honors people for helping the planet.
2. Stop supporting a society that rewards people when they hurt the planet.
3. Create eco money, eco kisses, eco music, eco arts, eco bracelets, eco credit$ and other eco rewards to make it happen.
cause.mission: Honor people for helping protect the planet.
cause.name: EarthE Honors
